mapper.select: SELECT u.*, ud.dept_id as dept_id, d.id as deptId, d.name as deptName, d.code as deptCode, ur.role_id as role_id, r.id as roleId, r.code as roleCode, r.name as roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_dept ud ON u.id = ud.user_id and ud.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on ud.dept_id = d.id AND d.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE u.delete_flag = 'Used' and u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.*, ud.dept_id as dept_id, d.id as deptId, d.name as deptName, d.code as deptCode, ur.role_id as role_id, r.id as roleId, r.code as roleCode, r.name as roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_dept ud ON u.id = ud.user_id and ud.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on ud.dept_id = d.id AND d.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE u.delete_flag = 'Used' order by u.create_date LIMIT ${limitStart}, ${size}

SELECT count(1) FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_dept ud ON u.id = ud.user_id and ud.delete_flag = 'Used' LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE u.delete_flag = 'Used'
